name: UDGames SAYW 8
description:
Hey!! Yes, I'm back with the UDGames SAYW!! If you don't know about this game, it's basically an FPS microgame with some extras. By the way, I also make original games other than microgames. Check my Itch.io account at https://udgames.itch.io, where you'll find some cool games! By the way, the SAYW stands for Shoot All You Want. For people who've known this game for some time, it still has the ultimate hamburger, yeah! Oh! I almost forgot one very important thing! Please leave a comment, if you've found any bugs, so that I can fix it as fast as possible!

Oh! Another thing, if you want to play the browser version of this game go to UDGames SAYW V.8 - Unity Play.
